Text:
Look, it's our friend with a poor taste in employers. Well this is his 10-15 minutes of fame, right up until admins remove his fakes and theres nothing to show for his efforts. What a way to end a working day, to know it was all for naught.

Let's just hope that mafiaa/riaa or who the fuck it is that pays his salary, screens for results.

Oh, if your employers are watching..I'd so download a car..and a hooker ..and a suitcase full of coke to go with'em  (C.Sheen analogy) 
;)
